marriageStage.title: Marriage Stage Decoration
marriageStage.description: Make your wedding unforgettable with our elegant and creative stage setups.
marriageStage.sectionDescription: SR Events specializes in stunning marriage stage decorations, blending tradition and modern elegance for your big day. Choose from a variety of themes and floral arrangements to match your dream wedding.

cards.title: Royal Floral Stage
cards.description: A grand stage adorned with fresh flowers, elegant drapes, and royal seating for the bride and groom.

video.details: A mesmerizing marriage stage setup with intricate floral designs and vibrant lighting, creating a magical ambiance for the couple and guests.

birthdaystage.title: Birthday Stage Decoration
birthdaystage.description: Make your birthday unforgettable with our elegant and creative stage setups.
birthdaystage.sectionDescription: SR Events specializes in stunning birthday stage decorations, blending fun, elegance, and creativity to make your celebration extraordinary. Choose from a variety of themes, balloons, backdrops, and floral arrangements to match your dream birthday vibe.

cards.title: Royal Birthday Floral Stage
cards.description: A beautifully designed birthday stage adorned with fresh flowers, vibrant balloons, themed props, and elegant lighting to create a royal and festive celebration.

video.details: A stunning birthday stage setup featuring themed decorations, colorful lighting, floral arrangements, and a joyful ambiance perfect for capturing unforgettable memories.

mangalaSnanam.title: Mangala Snanam
mangalaSnanam.description: Make the sacred Mangala Snanam ceremony in Telugu weddings a memorable experience.
mangalaSnanam.sectionDescription: Mangala Snanam is an important ritual in Telugu wedding tradition. The bride and groom take this holy bath for purification. Family and friends participate joyfully, anointing them with turmeric, kumkum, and oil, and offering their blessings.

cards.title: Sacred Mangala Snanam
cards.description: A traditional Mangala Snanam ceremony where the bride/groom is anointed with turmeric and oil.

video.details: During the Mangala Snanam ceremony, family members participate joyfully, singing traditional songs and offering their blessings to the bride/groom.
